$interpreted: Naya: You dimwit, WHO YOU CALLING TRAITOR?!
Theodore: Has amnesia suddenly befallen all of you? Have you forgotten what happened just moments ago?
Theodore: If Her Highness didn't hire others to dismantle our castle, would we be in such a predicament?
Poseur Female Noble: Touche, almost slipped my mind.
Frightened Male Noble: Is she still worthy of the crown?
Angelia: That's not true, it was an accident......
Theodore: I've raised the princess throughout the years, and know her character very well. She would never do anything outrageous without adequate reason.
Theodore: I suppose...my dear child was brainwashed by you?
Dylan: I saw what you did there. Trying to frame us as traitors too?
Sione: Too bad for you, since we'd like to accuse you of mutiny.
Theodore: What?
Theodore: Well I'll be a monkey's uncle! Didn't see you anywhere during the banquet, and there you are...
Dylan: Around a season ago, Theodore declared the princess ill and unable to meet visitors.
Dylan: However, truth is, the princess was kidnapped!
Sione: I rescued her from further persecution, and found the culprit .
Sione: Jahan, it's showtime.
Jahan: I'm truly sorry! It was Theodore, he commanded me to do so!
Jahan: He ordered me to kidnap the princess, to prevent her ascension and secure himself as ruler of our almighty Kingdom of the Sun!
Dylan: Theodore, what do you have to say now?
Theodore: Ahaha~ I thought it was some serious accusation. That's it? That was what you had to say about me?
Sione: Huh?
Theodore: I'll be blunt. Jahan Augustinus...I'm sure most have heard through the grapevine?
Theodore: Cry wolf, hah! Is there anyone confident in his credibility?
Poseur Female Noble: ...Truth be told, we're speaking about the devil himself in disguise indeed...
Frightened Male Noble: ...How could we trust Disgusting Augustinus...a little brownnoser indeed.
Jahan: HEY! I heard that!
Theodore: As for reputation, don't forget who it was that condemned the House of Vincent 5 years ago.
Theodore: Who caused Lord Douglas' dungeon demise!
Sione: YOU!
Theodore: Otherwise, any proof that I sent Jahan to kidnap the princess?
Dylan: ……….
Naya: This can't be, nothing at all?!
Sione: Not enough time. Pop, lock, and drop, it took us a while to catch the weasel Jahan...
Theodore: True, the princess did disappear three months ago. But as to not alarm our folk, I claimed she was ill.
Theodore: I sent forth armies to search for her whereabouts, yet never did it cross my mind she would be snatched by our own kind, the Sunshine Infantry!
Angelia: NO. Those are lies, YOU'RE LYING!
Theodore: Dylan induced morbid hatred into our princess, and convinced her to turn against me by committing the heinous crime of vandalizing our castle!
Theodore: As her uncle, I am left without words.
Theodore: Angelia no longer holds the right to rule. Please allow me, your most humble servant Theodore, to continue to bring prosperity to our nation.
Theodore: As for my niece, I shall take on full responsibility for her education!
Poseur Female Noble: Well said. I support our King, Theodore!
Frightened Male Noble: His Majesty's tactics have undeniably been the best!
Angelia: This too shall not pass! I am of age and the righteous heir to the throne!
Theodore: SILENCE!
Theodore: Guards, down with the treacherous Infantry! I want Angelia taken alive!
Naya: This thing is blown way out of proportion!
Dylan: Look alive, we must protect Her Highness!
Naya: Did we win?
Dylan: It's not over yet. Don't turn your back towards it!
Dylan: What the... !?
Dylan: Grrrrrrr!
Angelia: Colonel Levon!
Dylan: I'm fine. Look out!
Theodore: BE GONE!
Theodore: Huh, have they escaped...
Royal Infantry Captain: Your Majesty King Theodore. The Sunshine Infantry are nowhere to be seen. As for Jahan Augustinus, his whereabouts are also unknown.
Theodore: Who cares about that maggot. Escort me and the nobles back to Kingdom of the Sun,
Theodore: I must put out the wildfire that is about to spread!
Royal Infantry Captain: Understood!
Theodore: (Anyone that crosses my path shall not be spared.)
Theodore: (Not even you, my dear Angelia...)

Model.Text: You dimwit, WHO YOU CALLING TRAITOR?!
Has amnesia suddenly befallen all of you? Have you forgotten what happened just moments ago?
If Her Highness didn't hire others to dismantle our castle, would we be in such a predicament?
Touche, almost slipped my mind.
Is she still worthy of the crown?
That's not true, it was an accident......
I've raised the princess throughout the years, and know her character very well. She would never do anything outrageous without adequate reason.
I suppose...my dear child was brainwashed by you?
I saw what you did there. Trying to frame us as traitors too?
Too bad for you, since we'd like to accuse you of mutiny.
What?
Well I'll be a monkey's uncle! Didn't see you anywhere during the banquet, and there you are...
Around a season ago, Theodore declared the princess ill and unable to meet visitors.
However, truth is, the princess was kidnapped!
I rescued her from further persecution, and found the culprit .
Jahan, it's showtime.
I'm truly sorry! It was Theodore, he commanded me to do so!
He ordered me to kidnap the princess, to prevent her ascension and secure himself as ruler of our almighty Kingdom of the Sun!
Theodore, what do you have to say now?
Ahaha~ I thought it was some serious accusation. That's it? That was what you had to say about me?
Huh?
I'll be blunt. Jahan Augustinus...I'm sure most have heard through the grapevine?
Cry wolf, hah! Is there anyone confident in his credibility?
...Truth be told, we're speaking about the devil himself in disguise indeed...
...How could we trust Disgusting Augustinus...a little brownnoser indeed.
HEY! I heard that!
As for reputation, don't forget who it was that condemned the House of Vincent 5 years ago.
Who caused Lord Douglas' dungeon demise!
YOU!
Otherwise, any proof that I sent Jahan to kidnap the princess?
This can't be, nothing at all?!
Not enough time. Pop, lock, and drop, it took us a while to catch the weasel Jahan...
True, the princess did disappear three months ago. But as to not alarm our folk, I claimed she was ill.
I sent forth armies to search for her whereabouts, yet never did it cross my mind she would be snatched by our own kind, the Sunshine Infantry!
NO. Those are lies, YOU'RE LYING!
Dylan induced morbid hatred into our princess, and convinced her to turn against me by committing the heinous crime of vandalizing our castle!
As her uncle, I am left without words.
Angelia no longer holds the right to rule. Please allow me, your most humble servant Theodore, to continue to bring prosperity to our nation.
As for my niece, I shall take on full responsibility for her education!
Well said. I support our King, Theodore!
His Majesty's tactics have undeniably been the best!
This too shall not pass! I am of age and the righteous heir to the throne!
SILENCE!
Guards, down with the treacherous Infantry! I want Angelia taken alive!
This thing is blown way out of proportion!
Look alive, we must protect Her Highness!
Did we win?
It's not over yet. Don't turn your back towards it!
What the... !?
Grrrrrrr!
Colonel Levon!
I'm fine. Look out!
BE GONE!
Huh, have they escaped...
Your Majesty King Theodore. The Sunshine Infantry are nowhere to be seen. As for Jahan Augustinus, his whereabouts are also unknown.
Who cares about that maggot. Escort me and the nobles back to Kingdom of the Sun,
I must put out the wildfire that is about to spread!
Understood!
(Anyone that crosses my path shall not be spared.)
(Not even you, my dear Angelia...)
